entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning and ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
